about.details:
Incorporated in 2005, Focus Lighting & Fixtures Ltd (Focus) is engaged in providing wide range of products which includes recessed adjustable spotlights, recessed down lights, surface mounted spotlights, surface-mounted / suspended down lights, system based spotlights / wall washer, track-mounted spotlights, etc. each with different working capabilities.

Focus Lighting & Fixtures worked for some of the leading brands like And Designs, Global Designs, Croma, Raymond, Shoppers’ Stop, Park Avenue, Timberland, Globus and many more.

The products of the Company are designed from Germany, these designs are provided to their supplier in China and the moulds prepared as per the specified designs. The products are imported from China under the brand name of TRIX. Company's products under brand name of PLUS are manufactured by M/s. Shantilal & Bros (Mfg Dept). Appox. 70-80% of their total purchases are from Shantilal & Bros (Mfg Dept). Even for exports, appx. 90% of the products are manufactured by Shantilal & Bros (Mfg Dept). Now the Company has initiated the process of establishing its own manufacturing unit at Bhiwandi, Mumbai due to growing demand of its products.

contactDetails.full_address: Focus Lighting And Fixtures Ltd, 1007-1010 Corporate Avenue Wing A, Sonawala Road Near Udyog Bhavan, Goregaon (East)

faqs.question: What is the Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO?
faqs.answer:
Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO is a SME IPO of 900000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.05 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹45 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 30, 2017, and closes on April 5, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO opens on March 30, 2017 and closes on April 5, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO?
faqs.answer: Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Focus Lighting And Fixtures IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
